primaryCredential.description: StandX JWT token from https://standx.com/user/session (valid 7 days)

optionalEnvVars.name: STANDX_PRIVATE_KEY
optionalEnvVars.description: Ed25519 private key (Base58) for trading operations

install.script: curl -L -o /tmp/standx.tar.gz https://github.com/wjllance/standx-cli/releases/download/v0.4.3/standx-v0.4.3-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.gz && tar -xzf /tmp/standx.tar.gz -C /tmp && sudo mv /tmp/standx /usr/local/bin/ && sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/standx
install.label: Install StandX CLI on Linux

install.script: curl -L -o /tmp/standx.tar.gz https://github.com/wjllance/standx-cli/releases/download/v0.4.3/standx-v0.4.3-aarch64-apple-darwin.tar.gz && tar -xzf /tmp/standx.tar.gz -C /tmp && sudo mv /tmp/standx /usr/local/bin/ && sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/standx
install.label: Install StandX CLI on macOS

install.script: git clone https://github.com/wjllance/standx-cli.git ~/.openclaw/skills/standx-cli && echo 'Skill installed. Please install standx binary separately via Homebrew or direct download.'
install.label: Manual install (skill only, binary separate)
